channel.title: facebook on SHELTRON Visuals

item.title: this._node
item.description: Interactive Facebook Graph Visualization A collaboration with Tom Bandage. Users log in on the website, and their connections are displayed in the space. I implemented a custom THREE.js 3D graph renderer, using a force-directed layout [source]. Every line represents a single like, comment or photo tag shared between the two users. The 3D Structure spins slowly and responds to new users being added. Featured at East Austin Studio Tour DUE EAST & Chicon Collective.
